item.title: Medtronic makes two key additions to its board. How activist Elliott can build shareholder value
item.description: The stage seems to be set for a long-term mutually beneficial relationship between the parties.

item.title: Buy these outperforming stocks with room to run, says UBS
item.description: As earnings season winds down, investors should be on the lookout for some stocks that might still have room for upside, according to UBS.

item.title: Why Morgan Stanley says the market and the economy are telling 'diverging' stories
item.description: U.S. stocks have proven resilient even as the Trump administration haphazardly implements policy changes, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: Bank of America says these five stocks have room to run
item.description: Bank of America named five stocks to buy right now.

item.title: Ether notches first new record since 2021 after Powell speech teasing rate cuts
item.description: The price of ether smashed through its 2021 record on Friday after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell hinted at upcoming rate cuts.
